sentences.en: " I haven't any pity for a man who would be such a chump as that. "
sentences.cn: " 我对这种榆木脑瓜的家伙一点也不可怜. ”

sentences.en: Can't you see I have you Chump?
sentences.cn: 难道没看出来我把你当成傻瓜 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can't you see I have you Chump? Get me some whiskey!
sentences.cn: 难道没看出来我把你当成傻瓜 吗 ?给我倒点威士忌!

sentences.en: Chump: To chew or make a chewing movement.
sentences.cn: 咀嚼: 咀嚼或做咀嚼动作.

sentences.en: Don't fret over chump change and just hold on for now.
sentences.cn: 不要这么烦恼现在就这样继续下去吧.

sentences.en: Give everybody a present and drop this chump, all right?
sentences.cn: 把这蠢货击败当成给大家的礼物, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hey ! Chump ! How charmed can one life be?
sentences.cn: 嘿笨蛋生命能够多迷人?

sentences.en: His actions are so irrational that I think he must be off his chump.
sentences.cn: 他的行为毫无理智,我认为他一定是疯了.

sentences.en: I was beginning to think he'd gone off his chump.
sentences.cn: 我开始想他已经发了疯了。

sentences.en: The guy's a chump. I could do a better job myself.
sentences.cn: 那家伙是个笨蛋。我自己做得都比他好。

sentences.en: You chump! Why did you tell her that?
sentences.cn: 笨蛋, 干吗告诉她那件事?

sentences.en: You seem half off your chump this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天早上你像是有点儿疯了.

sentences.en: You stayed home and played Ms. Pac - Man while l went to work like a chump?
sentences.cn: 等等,你这一整天在家玩游戏机而我像笨蛋一样去上班?

trans.tran_cn: 傻瓜，笨蛋，短而厚的木块
